title: fix: 8017, move wayland notes to debug context

body:
fixes #8017 

For the wayland backend these messages are now under the `Debug` Context
  - `failed to create xkb context: Resource temporarily unavailable`
  -  `logical output size: 1536x864@0.0`

issue.title: Change log level for failure notes to warning on Wayland client
issue.body:
### Feature Request

This seems like it should be warning:
[2024-12-28T11:53:03] NOTE: failed to create xkb context: Resource temporarily unavailable

This looks more like debug:
[2024-12-28T11:53:03] NOTE: logical output size: 1536x864@0.0

nodes.body: the first one is Normal on wayland while it waits for you to allow capture, So i will make that a debug mesage also.
